Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Conversion to SRL prevented CsA - induced renal damage evolution ( absent / mild grade lesions ) , while NGAL ( serum versus urine ) seems to be a feasible biomarker of CsA replacement to SRL .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CsA (Calcineurin inhibitor) - induced renal damage |

Explanation:

* "CsA (Calcineurin inhibitor) - induced renal damage" is identified as a Disease entity because it refers to a health condition where the renal system is damaged due to the administration of Calcineurin inhibitor, in this case, CsA.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CsA (Calcineurin inhibitor) - induced renal damage |

Explanation:

* "CsA (Calcineurin inhibitor) - induced renal damage" is identified as a Disease entity because it refers to a health condition where the renal system is damaged due to the administration of Calcineurin inhibitor, in this case, CsA.
* "Absent / mild grade lesions" is not considered a Disease entity because it is a description of the severity of the renal damage rather than a specific disease.
* "NGAL (serum versus urine)" is not considered a Disease entity because it is a biomarker used to detect renal damage, not a disease itself.

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Conversion to SRL prevented CsA - induced renal damage evolution ( absent / mild grade lesions ) , while NGAL ( serum versus urine ) seems to be a feasible biomarker of CsA replacement to SRL .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| CsA |
| SRL |
| NGAL |

Explanation:

* CsA: Cyclosporine A
* SRL: Sirolimus
* NGAL: Neutrophil Gelatinase-Associated Lipocalin
